category.name: Product Structure.Configurator Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSESolutionVariantAutoCreate
preference.preference_description: Enables automatic ID generation for the new solution variant Item creation. This is supported for single level solution variant creation only. Valid Values: * true: An auto generated ID will be assigned to the new solution variant Item and the Item creation wizard will not be shown. * false: Item creation wizard will be shown.
